alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft; Saguache County West of Continental Divide Below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 1:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Chaffee and western Saguache Counties through 130 PM MDT... At 1258 PM MDT, Doppler radar and satellite imagery were tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 12 miles northwest of La Garita, or 39 miles southwest of Decker Burn Scar, moving north at 10 mph. These storms could produce locally heavy rainfall. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar and satellite indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bonanza, North Pass and Sargents. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
